formulas.name: DatePickerEndDate
formulas.expression: IF( {!Enter_Desired_Date} = IF( MONTH({!Enter_Desired_Date}) = 12, DATE(YEAR({!Enter_Desired_Date}), 12, 31), DATE(YEAR({!Enter_Desired_Date}), MONTH({!Enter_Desired_Date}) + 1, 1) - 1 ), IF( DAY({!Product_Start_Date}) < 30, IF( MONTH({!Enter_Desired_Date}) = 12, DATE(YEAR({!Enter_Desired_Date}) + 1, 1, 1), DATE(YEAR({!Enter_Desired_Date}), MONTH({!Enter_Desired_Date}) + 1, 1) ), DATE(YEAR({!Enter_Desired_Date}), MONTH({!Enter_Desired_Date}), 30) ), IF( DAY({!Enter_Desired_Date}) = DAY({!Product_Start_Date}) - 1, {!Enter_Desired_Date} + 1, {!Enter_Desired_Date} ) )

formulas.name: LineDescription
SeatsIncludedCRM
formulas.expression: IF({!Loop_Products.Product2.Name}="Dazos CRM Platform", {!forQuantity}, IF({!Loop_Products.Product2.Name}="IQ Platform", {!forQuantity}, null))

formulas.name: Year1BookingsFormula
formulas.expression: IF( ISPICKVAL( {!Loop_Products.Product2.Subscription_Frequency__c}, "One Time"), {!year1Sales_Price}* {!year1Quantity}, IF( ISPICKVAL( {!Loop_Products.Product2.Subscription_Frequency__c}, "Monthly"), {!year1Sales_Price} * {!Product_Term_Months}* {!year1Quantity}, IF( ISPICKVAL( {!Loop_Products.Product2.Subscription_Frequency__c} , "Annual"), {!year1Sales_Price} * ( {!Product_Term_Months} / 12) * {!year1Quantity}, 0 ) ) )

formulas.name: Year2BookingsFormula
formulas.expression: IF( ISPICKVAL( {!Loop_Products.Product2.Subscription_Frequency__c}, "One Time"), {!year2Sales_Price}* {!year2Quantity}, IF( ISPICKVAL( {!Loop_Products.Product2.Subscription_Frequency__c}, "Monthly"), {!year2Sales_Price} * {!Product_Term_Months}* {!year2Quantity}, IF( ISPICKVAL( {!Loop_Products.Product2.Subscription_Frequency__c} , "Annual"), {!year2Sales_Price}* ( {!Product_Term_Months} / 12) *{!year2Quantity}, 0 ) ) )

formulas.name: year3BookingsFormula
formulas.expression: IF( ISPICKVAL( {!Loop_Products.Product2.Subscription_Frequency__c}, "One Time"), {!year3Sales_Price}* {!year3Quantity}, IF( ISPICKVAL( {!Loop_Products.Product2.Subscription_Frequency__c}, "Monthly"), {!year3Sales_Price} * {!Product_Term_Months}* {!year3Quantity}, IF( ISPICKVAL( {!Loop_Products.Product2.Subscription_Frequency__c} , "Annual"), {!year3Sales_Price} * ( {!Product_Term_Months} / 12) * {!year3Quantity}, 0 ) ) )

fields.name: NoActiveEntriesHeader
